abstract.p: Banco Itau, one of Brazil's largest banks, acquires 12 percent of America Online Latin America as part of strategic effort by Internet provider to expand throughout country (S)

block.p: One of Brazil's largest banks, Banco Itau, acquired 12 percent of America Online Latin America as part of a strategic effort by the Internet provider to expand throughout the country. AOL Latin America will provide limited free access to Itau's 700,000 clients that use online banking, with the potential of expanding to all of the bank's more than seven million clients in Brazil. Itau is the last of Brazil's large banks to offer free Internet access to its clients for home banking. AOL Latin America plans to make a $575 million initial public offering later this year.
